verses.verse: And I <WG2504>, brethren <WG80>, when I came <WG2064> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209>, came <WG2064> not <WG3756> with <WG2596> excellency <WG5247> of speech <WG3056> or <WG2228> of wisdom <WG4678>, proclaiming <WG2605> to you <WG5213> the testimony <WG3142> of God <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> I determined <WG2919> not <WG3756> to know <WG1492> anything <WG5100> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, save1487, 3361 Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, and <WG2532> him <WG5126> crucified <WG4717>.
And <WG2532> I <WG1473> was <WG1096> with <WG4314> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> weakness <WG769>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> fear <WG5401>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> much <WG4183> trembling <WG5156>.

And <WG2532> my <WG3450> speech <WG3056> and <WG2532> my <WG3450> preaching <WG2782> were not <WG3756> in <WG1722> persuasive <WG3981> words <WG3056> of <WG442> wisdom <WG4678>, but <WG235> in <WG1722> demonstration <WG585> of the Spirit <WG4151> and <WG2532> of power <WG1411>:
that <WG2443> your <WG5216> faith <WG4102> should not <WG3361> stand <WG5600> in <WG1722> the wisdom <WG4678> of men <WG444>, but <WG235> in <WG1722> the power <WG1411> of God <WG2316>.

We speak <WG2980> wisdom <WG4678>, however <WG1161>, among <WG1722> them <WG3588> that are fullgrown <WG5046>: yet <WG1161> a wisdom <WG4678> not <WG3756> of this <WG5127> world <WG165>, nor <WG3761> of the rulers <WG758> of this <WG5127> world <WG165>, who <WG3588> are coming to nought <WG2673>:

but <WG235> we speak <WG2980> God <WG2316>'s wisdom <WG4678> in <WG1722> a mystery <WG3466>, even the wisdom that hath been hidden <WG613>, which <WG3739> God <WG2316> foreordained <WG4309> before <WG4253> the worlds <WG165> unto <WG1519> our <WG2257> glory <WG1391>:

which <WG3739> none <WG3762> of the rulers <WG758> of this <WG5127> world <WG165> hath known <WG1097>: for <WG1063> had <WG1487> they known <WG1097> it <WG4717>, they would not <WG3756> have <WG302> crucified <WG4717> the Lord <WG2962> of glory <WG1391>:

but <WG235> as <WG2531> it is written <WG1125>, Things which <WG3739> eye <WG3788> saw <WG1492> not <WG3756>, and2532, 3756 ear <WG3775> heard <WG191> not <WG2532>, And which entered <WG305> not <WG3756> into <WG1909> the heart <WG2588> of man <WG444>, Whatsoever <WG3739> things God <WG2316> prepared <WG2090> for them <WG3588> that love <WG25> him <WG846>.

But <WG1161> unto us <WG2254> God <WG2316> revealed <WG601> them through <WG1223> the <WG846> Spirit <WG4151>: for <WG1063> the Spirit <WG4151> searcheth <WG2045> all things <WG3956>, yea <WG2532>, the deep things <WG899> of God <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> who <WG5101> among men <WG444> knoweth <WG1492> the things <WG3588> of a man <WG444>, save1487, 3361 the spirit <WG4151> of the man <WG444>, which is <WG3588> in <WG1722> him <WG846>? even <WG2532> so <WG3779> the things <WG3588> of God <WG2316> none <WG3762> knoweth <WG1492>, save1487, 3361 the Spirit <WG4151> of God <WG2316>.

But <WG1161> we <WG2249> received <WG2983>, not <WG3756> the spirit <WG4151> of the world <WG2889>, but <WG235> the spirit <WG4151> which is <WG3588> from <WG1537> God <WG2316>; that <WG2443> we might know <WG1492> the things that <WG3588> were freely given <WG5483> to us <WG2254> of <WG5259> God <WG2316>.

Which things <WG3739> also <WG2532> we speak <WG2980>, not <WG3756> in <WG1722> words <WG3056> which man <WG442>'s wisdom <WG4678> teacheth <WG1318>, but <WG235> which <WG1722> the <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> teacheth <WG1318>; combining <WG4793> spiritual <WG4152> things with spiritual words <WG4152>.

Now <WG1161> the natural <WG5591> man <WG444> receiveth <WG1209> not <WG3756> the things <WG3588> of the Spirit <WG4151> of God <WG2316>: for <WG1063> they are <WG2076> foolishness <WG3472> unto him <WG846>; and <WG2532> he <WG3756> cannot <WG1410> know <WG1097> them <WG3754>, because they are spiritually <WG4153> judged <WG350>.
But <WG1161> he that <WG3588> is spiritual4152, Ezekiel3 judgeth <WG350> all things <WG3956>, and <WG1161> he himself <WG846> is judged <WG350> of <WG5259> no man <WG3762>.

For <WG1063> who <WG5101> hath known <WG1097> the mind <WG3563> of the Lord <WG2962>, that <WG3739> he should instruct <WG4822> him <WG846>? But <WG1161> we <WG2249> have <WG2192> the mind <WG3563> of Christ <WG5547>.
